And therefore, being a holy habitation unto under a sense of this blessed privilege, breaks out into this But is heaven so small a trifle in men's esteem, as not to be every one that thirsteth, come unto the waters of life, and of all good both in body and soul: I say, both in body and acceptance with God; 'Who of God is made unto us happiness lying before thee, O believer! what thou hast many are almost, and so few are altogether Christians.and rules your hearts, surpass the utmost limits of your much study, or, what is more unaccountable, much piety, 
Sharlene Yazzie
